reviewText: Seek I and Seek II are hail by many as the most repersentative 'operations' of the Cool Devices universe.  They had the most bondage-intense, and dehumanlizing torture in the entire serie.  The actions in many of the sences are so 'disgusting' that they will sent even a hard-core hentai/fetish fan vomiting all the way from his TV set to his toilet.  All sex related subjects are very offensively protrayed, with all of the female characters either heavily sexually abused or torture in many different ways.  As 'ugly' as these two stories might seem, I do think that appluse is still due to the director of them.  The ideas of bondage of the body, and bondage of the mind are creatively presented in both of these stories.  The director did a superme job on showing the viewers about what it means to surrender ones body and mind to another, and be dominated. The animation quality was quiet good in both of the stories.  The plot was very conhesive to the central theme of bondage and domination/submission.  I would had given this title a 5-star if it was presented in a more sensual, and less anti-erotic way.

A good hentai anime. Lots of bondage,sex and some torture scenes. Best of all its uncensored! If you like hentai style anime you will like this movie. They don't call it "Cool Devices" for nothing, you will  know what I mean when you see it.
